successes.title: THE AGENTS - A Double-edged Cards Game
successes.description: A strategic 2-5 players card game of clever tactics & critical consequences, set in a world of spies, sabotage, secrecy and subterfuge.

Pledges.description: 'I spy...a nice guy' - help us on our way and receive the full PnP version.

COMPLETE PnP with ALL EXPANSIONS + STRETCH GOALS: This tier is for any backer who just wants to keep it digital. You can request your complete PnP in one of any of the available languages (English, Spanish, French, Russian or German - more may be added.)
BASE OF OPERATIONS (Early Bird): Base set + the Kickstarter-exclusive Commanders promo pack + ALL stretch goals!
BASE OF OPERATIONS: Base set + the Kickstarter-exclusive Commanders promo pack + ALL stretch goals!
CALL FOR BACKUP (Early Bird): Base set + the Kickstarter-exclusive Commanders promo pack + 1 expansion of your choice + ALL stretch goals!
CALL FOR BACKUP: Base set + the Kickstarter-exclusive Commanders promo pack + 1 expansion of your choice + ALL stretch goals!
THE AGENCY (Early Bird): The FULL package - Base set + the Kickstarter-exclusive Commanders promo pack + 2 expansions + ALL stretch goals!
THE AGENCY: The FULL package - Base set + the Kickstarter-exclusive Commanders promo pack + 2 expansions + ALL stretch goals!
THE COMPANY: The FULLER package - Base set + the Kickstarter-exclusive Commanders promo pack + 3 expansions + ALL stretch goals!
THE BUREAU: The FULLEST package - Base set + the Kickstarter-exclusive Commanders promo pack + 4 expansions + ALL stretch goals! (Special saving in this tier!)

THE SECRET SANTA: This non-religious, non-denominational holiday pack gets you one FULL set for you AND one for a lucky friend (i.e. THE AGENCY x2). Turn this snowy holiday season into the ultimate 'cold war'.

THE COLLABORATOR: Be the very first to get the full game. You'll get a digital print of the base set and expansions immediately after the campaign ends and an opportunity to share your thoughts with us before we go to print. You can show off to all your buddies that you were first to play The Agents. As thanks, we'll credit you as a collaborator. Plus everything included in THE AGENCY.
THE COLLECTOR: Original signed art + signed early print of the base set + expansions. Plus everything included in THE AGENCY.
THE TAKE: Base Set, 4 expansions, SpoofSpansion, 1 T-shirt, Artbook, Fancy Box (plus the Kickstarter-exclusive Commanders promo pack + ALL Stretch Goals). (This tier includes an $8 saving!)

THE DOUBLE AGENT: We'll transform you into an customized design, Agent version of yourself, to be part of the Kickstarter-exclusive Commanders promo pack. Plus ALL rewards included in 'THE COLLECTOR'.

CRITICAL MASS: 6 FULL sets of the The Agents -  including expansions + stretch goals. I.e 6 x THE AGENCY. We've set the price per game at the early bird price and thrown in a little shipping discount to boot. Perfect for gaming groups!

THE SECRET AGENT: We'll turn you into a secret Agent before you know it. Become part of  the "Secret Agents" expansion pack with a customized-design, Agent version of yourself. Plus ALL rewards included in 'THE COLLECTOR'.

THE SPOOF AGENT: Be one of our crazy new spoof Agents, introduced as a new add-on 'spoofspansion' due to popular demand. Danny will turn you into one of the 8 Agents that are voted on by the backer community, to be a part of the pack. Plus ALL rewards included in 'THE COLLECTOR'.

THE PARTNER IN CRIME: We'll turn you into a special 'Partner Agent' in our still highly classified upcoming expansion, which will be de-censored very soon. These Partner Agents will stand by the Faction Agents as they complete the most dangerous and complicated Missions. We'll make a customized-design, Agent version of yourself. Plus ALL rewards included in 'THE COLLECTOR'.

THE BLACK OPS RECRUIT: We are recruiting you into our elite Black Ops Unit. Sign up for our most hardcore and exclusive unit yet and we'll turn you into a customized-design Agent version of yourself. Are you ready? Plus ALL rewards included in 'THE COLLECTOR'.
